On some poorly tasting jokes

So yesterday at work I was addressed with some jokes.

I was told:

Whatâ€™s worse than having a worm in your apple?

Having half a worm in your apple and the other in your mouth.

There is an anti joke for it. Poor taste the anti joke, giving the story of my broader family.

Thanks G-d I am alive. Which brings me to the second joke I was told.

We should cherish to be alive. Let's conclude with a bit of music.
